limbo.error: No Player online to limbo player! Waiting for next event...
paper.required: This plugin requires a modern version of Paper to run!
paper.version.unsupported: 1.20 is not supported! Please use a version newer than 1.20 and come on... 1.20 is not even supported by Paper!
no-permission: <red>You don't have permission to do that!
update.message: There is a new version of Keklist available! You're using version %s and the newest version is @latestVersion! Please update to get the newest features and bugfixes!
api.proxy-send-fail: Could not send response to proxy!
plan.not-enabled: Plan is not enabled, cannot register DataExtension.
plan.error: DataExtension implementation is invalid, cannot register DataExtension.
limbo.no-schematic: The schematic file for the Limbo doesn't exist! Could not load %s
limbo.no-api: LimboAPI not found! Please install LimboAPI to use the Limbo!
limbo.proxy-disabled: Velocity Limbo not enabled! Kicking player instead if message from Spigot Plugin...
limbo.where-am-i: Know body really knows? Maybe on the main server, maybe not. I hope you enjoy this server! Maybe just build something here.
limbo.sent: User %s is entering the Keklist Limbo from Server %s. Operation took %sseconds
limbo.disable-kick:
The Limbo server is disabled on proxy side! 
 Kicking you instead <3
limbo.user-not-found: Failed to send user with UUID: %s to the limbo! User not found.
limbo.map.error: Could not load BufferedImage from file map file!
limbo.map.not-found: Could not find map file! Please check your config!
velocity.config.error: Error while creating config file! Please report this to the developer!
velocity.api.disabled: Received API message from backend, but API is disabled!
velocity.api.response-not-found: Server %S not found! Could not send keklist backend response to it!
velocity.api.action-server-not-found: Server %s not found! Could not send message to it!
database.connect-fail: Could not connect to the database! Disabling plugin...
database.driver-missing: MariaDB driver not found! Disabling plugin...
blacklist.icon.error: Could not find the blacklisted icon file!
blacklist.description: Blacklists a player or ip from the server.
blacklist.reason-too-long: <red>Reason is too long! Please use at least 1500 characters!
blacklist.allow-blacklisted: <green>Blacklisted players are now allowed to join with an admin online!
blacklist.already-allow-blacklisted: <red>Blacklisted players are already allowed to join with an admin online!
blacklist.disallow-blacklisted: <green>Blacklisted players are now not allowed to join with an admin online!
blacklist.already-disallow-blacklisted: <red>Blacklisted players are already not allowed to join with an admin online!
whitelist.description: Whitelists a player or ip to the server.
whitelist.invalid-domain: <red>Invalid domain! Please use a valid domain to add to the whitelist!
gui.whitelist.title: <gold><b>Whitelist
gui.whitelist.add.title: <green>Add Entry
gui.whitelist.add.description: <gray><i>Type in a username/IP to add to the whitelist
gui.whitelist.remove.title: <red>Remove Player
gui.whitelist.remove.description: <gray><i>Type in a username/IP to remove from the whitelist
gui.whitelist.sign.destroy: <red><i>This sign is currently used by an admin to configure the whitelist! You can not destroy it!
gui.whitelist.list.title: <blue>List Entries
gui.whitelist.list.entry: <gray><i>Click to see more information about this entry
gui.whitelist.entry.player.name: Username: %s
gui.whitelist.entry.ip.name: IP: %s
gui.blacklist.title: <blue><b>Blacklist
gui.blacklist.add.title: <green>Add Entry
gui.blacklist.add.description: <gray><i>Type in a username/IP to add to the blacklist
gui.blacklist.add.description.motd: <gray><i>Type "motd" in line 3 to add the ip to the motd-blacklist
gui.blacklist.remove.title: <red>Remove Player
gui.blacklist.remove.description: <gray><i>Type in a username/IP to remove from the blacklist
gui.blacklist.list.title: <blue>List Entries
gui.blacklist.list.entry: <gray><i>Click to see more information about this entry
gui.blacklist.entry.player.name: Username: %s
gui.blacklist.entry.ip.name: IP: %s
gui.blacklist.entry.motd.name: IP: %s
gui.settings.title: <green><b>Settings
gui.settings.whitelist.title: <green>Whitelist
gui.settings.whitelist.enable.title: <green>Enable
gui.settings.whitelist.disable.title: <red>Disable
gui.settings.whitelist.info.title: <yellow><b>Info
gui.settings.blacklist.title: <blue><b>Blacklist
gui.settings.blacklist.enable.title: <green>Enable
gui.settings.blacklist.disable.title: <red>Disable
gui.settings.blacklist.info.title: <yellow><b>Info
gui.settings.info.title: <yellow>Plugin Status

discord.blacklist.kicked:
Kicked **%s** from the server cause of blacklist!

discord.http.namefetch: Failed to get name from Mojang API: %s
discord.http.uuid-error: Failed to get name from Mojang API. This may be a problem, because the player does exist. Report this to the Developer: %s
keklist.description: Command to manage the Keklist plugin's features.
keklist.manage.disabled: <red>This command is disabled due to security reasons! <grey><i>This can be enabled in the config.
keklist.player-info: Player Info Name: %name% Ip address: %ip% Whitelisted: %whitelisted% Blacklisted: %blacklisted% Brand: %brand% Ping: %ping% Protocol Version: %version% Gamemode: %gamemode% Location: %x% %y% %z% Ssh... also hover over the other fields!'>Hover too see additional data
keklist.ip-info: IP Info: IP Address: %ip% Country: Continent: %continent% Code: %continent_code%'>%country% | Code: %country_code% City: Region: %region%'>%city% Timezone: %timezone% internet service provider '>ISP: AS: %as%'>%org% Mobile: %mobile% | Proxy/VPN: %proxy% | Hosting: %hosting% Ssh... also hover over the other fields!'>Hover too see additional data
floodgate.api-key-not-set: <orange>You did not set the Floodgate API key in the config! Either get the floodgate uuid from https://mcprofile.io using the UUID directly or the floodgate user must be in the server's cache otherwise the request will fail!
geyser.events.error: An error occurred while checking the IP blacklist on geyser: %s
ip.rate-limit: Rate limit reached! Please try again later! IP's can only be requested 45 times per minute!
http.not-found: <red>Could not find the player! More information: %s
http.null-response: Response is null! Please try again later!
http.rate-limit: Rate limit reached! Please try again later! Non cached bedrock players can only be requested 200 times per hour!
